T02D3759:113b-1: gu ru pa ra ma pu nya shri na ma sto tra /
T02D3759:113b-3: bla ma dam pa bsod nams dpal zhes bya ba la bstod pa /
T02D3759:113b-4: chos 'byung rab gzigs shin tu yangs pa'i sku mnga' ba //
T02D3759:113b-5: bsod nams dpal gyi zhabs zung dag la brten par bgyi //
T02D3759:113b-6: mkhas pa 'di ni kun du bskyod bar gyur pa la //
T02D3759:113b-7: sngon chad ma mthong stong nyid rtse mos ngo mtshar mthong //
T02D3759:113b-8: shin tu rgya chen zab pa 'di ni chen po'i tshul //
T02D3759:113b-9: mchod rten bskyod pa lta bu'i sku la lhag par brten //
T02D3759:113b-10: dpal mchog bla ma ston pa'i bstan pa la //
T02D3759:113b-11: dus des gsal ba 'od gsal chen po'i tshul ;
T02D3759:113b-12: / mtshungs med snying rje'i bcud kyis sems can bde mdzad pa //
T02D3759:113b-13: 'di ni ngo mtshar bsod nams dpal gyi ye shes sku //
T02D3759:113b-14: de ni kun la byams pas phyag kyang rab tu 'tshal //
T02D3759:113b-15: bde zhing bde ba'i snang ldan spros pa mi mnga' ba //
T02D3759:113b-16: bzod ba'i gter chen bsam gtan dga' ba'i ro mchog dang //
T02D3759:113b-17: rnam pa kun du rdzogs sangs byang chub lam rnams mkhyen //
T02D3759:113b-18: gti mug mun ldongs 'grol rab tu gsal bar mdzad //
T02D3759:113b-19: de ni brtse ldan bsod nams dpal gyi ye shes sku //
T02D3759:113b-20: po ta la kar spyan ras gzigs dbang zhabs pad la //
T02D3759:113b-21: bung ba rol pa zhes bya'i stobs ldan spyan dag gis //
T02D3759:114a-1: phyogs yul du lam tshol yang dag bskyod pa yis //
T02D3759:114a-2: rim bzhin 'chag la dub pa med pa'i bsod nams dpal //
T02D3759:114a-3: sangs rgyas mthu yis rgya mtsho zla bas gang ba bzhin //
T02D3759:114a-4: dpal mchog bla ma 'di ni lam mchog ded dpon mkhas //
T02D3759:114a-5: ye shes bdud rtsi'i rlangs kyi lam gyis dub pa la //
T02D3759:114a-6: nyer phyin lam la mkhas rnams kun gyis brten par bya //
T02D3759:114a-7: dpal mchog bla ma 'di ni ston pa'i bstan pa la //
T02D3759:114a-8: dus la rab gsal 'od gsal chen po'i tshul //
T02D3759:114a-9: mtshungs med bla ma'i zhabs la rab tu 'dud //
T02D3759:114a-10: rgya gar lho phyogs kyi yul dpal ldan 'bras kyi
T02D3759:114a-11: phung po zhes bya ba'i mchod rten bzhugs pa'i gnas
T02D3759:114a-12: der bla ma man lungs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi
T02D3759:114a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dang cha
T02D3759:114a-15: mthun pa la mos pa'i panti ta bi ma la
T02D3759:114a-16: shr'i zhes bya ba mkhas shing btsun pa des tshigs
T02D3759:114a-18: dpal ldan man lungs kyi gtsug lag khang chen por panti ta go ta ma bha dra dang /
